data.description: This Training teaches a multitude of procedures and techniques for combating small fires using standard fire extinguishers.

changelog.change_log:
New Features and Enhancements
Weâ€™re excited to introduce several new features and environments in this update, designed to enhance your fire safety training experience. These additions will provide more realistic and challenging scenarios to better prepare you for real-world situations.

1. Fire Prevention Level
Overview: This new level challenges users to identify potential fire hazards in various environments. Learn to spot common and uncommon fire risks that could lead to dangerous situations.

2. Evacuation Level
Overview: Experience a simulated fire emergency where your primary goal is to safely evacuate all occupants. This level emphasizes the importance of quick decision-making and following evacuation procedures.

3. Large Fire Scenario: Too Big to Extinguish
Overview: Sometimes, the best option is not to fight the fire but to focus on containment and evacuation. This new scenario presents a massive fire that is beyond your ability to extinguish.

4. New Environment: Underground Garage
Overview: Navigate a new underground garage environment, complete with complex layouts, low visibility, and unique fire hazards.

5. New Environment: Office
Overview: Train in a new office environment that simulates a modern workplace setting. This environment includes various scenarios such as electrical fires, blocked exits, and crowded areas.

Additional Improvements
Extra feature: Emergency button in laboratory.
Performance Optimizations: Improved loading times and smoother frame rates across all devices.
Bug Fixes: Resolved several issues reported by users, improving overall stability and user experience.
Please use the code: 2260-453810 to try out the application.
